Sentencas: A high temperature electrochemical cell with a bed of solid carbon at the anode and steam at the cathode is proposed for carbon-assisted hydrogen production.
Titulo: Feasibility of hydrogen production in a steam-carbon electrochemical cell

Sentencas: This scheme eliminates the uphill potential barrier and provides a significant reduction in the required electrical work input to produce hydrogen from steam.
Titulo: Feasibility of hydrogen production in a steam-carbon electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The electrochemical cell is made of an yttria stabilized zirconia electrolyte with porous platinum electrodes.
Titulo: Feasibility of hydrogen production in a steam-carbon electrochemical cell

Sentencas: Current-voltage measurements and gas chromatographic analysis indicate steam utilization and production of carbon-free hydrogen.
Titulo: Feasibility of hydrogen production in a steam-carbon electrochemical cell

Sentencas: Measured open circuit potentials of 0.1-0.6 V agree with theoretical values.
Titulo: Feasibility of hydrogen production in a steam-carbon electrochemical cell

Sentencas: This downhill driving force allows for spontaneous hydrogen production and cogeneration of electricity.
Titulo: Feasibility of hydrogen production in a steam-carbon electrochemical cell
